manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_cgc_group_info` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `keyword` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '关联关键字', `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `group_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `group_desc` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `show` int(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否显示 0 显示，1不显示', `createtime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '生成时间', `rule_keyword` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_cgc_group_record` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `type` int(1) NOT NULL COMMENT '0关键字1二维码，2默认关注', `nickname` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `openid` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `group_id` int(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `group_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `createtime` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '创建时间', `content` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
manifest.uninstall: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_cgc_group_info`; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_cgc_group_record`;
